instructions: To indicate that you are participating in Ask First/It's the Law and doing your part to prevent tobacco sales to minors, please complete this form and send it in the enclosed postage-paid envelope or mail it to 1500 Ardmore Blvd., Suite 202, Pittsburgh, PA 15221. Completing this form will also allow us to add your establishment to the mailing list to receive new and updated Ask First/It's the Law program materials.
consent: Yes, you may use my store's name as an Ask First/It's the Law participant in promotional materials and advertising with my prior knowledge.
